phase_1.name: Planning
phase_1.description: Work on early product or production planning: market and demand analysis, production planning, conceptual design, capacity planning, forecasting, scenario evaluation before the factory is running.

phase_2.name: Development_Production
phase_2.description: Work on designing and developing products or running production processes: process setup, scheduling, line balancing, robotics, automation, real-time control during manufacturing.

phase_3.name: Optimization
phase_3.description: Work on improving existing processes or systems using collected data: monitoring, anomaly detection, predictive maintenance, quality improvement, process optimization, parameter tuning.

phase_4.name: Use_Reuse
phase_4.description: Work on how products are used in the field or reused: in-service monitoring, usage data, remaining useful life, remanufacturing, refurbishment, recycling, circular economy, end-of-life strategies.
